articles.author: Brie Stimson
articles.title: European, Asian postal services to halt shipments to US after end of de minimis tariff exemption - Fox Business
articles.description: Postal services across Europe and Asia have paused U.S. deliveries ahead of new Trump administration tariff rules taking effect next Friday, Aug. 29.
articles.content:
Postal services in Europe and around the world plan to halt shipping merchandise to the U.S. as the Trump administration’s end of the de minimus tariff exemption goes into effect. 
The "de minimus" … [+3517 chars]
